sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Waits for approval on Task record from Big Oil 2 Customer Support (Group)

sys_variable_value.value: Your Authorization Request has been Approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Authorization Request Record➛Requesting User➛First name,

 

This messagin has been sent to inform you the authorization request for Trigger➛Authorization Request Record➛Auth Name has been approved! Your profile has been updated to reflect this change and you should now have access to those features of the portal.  If you have any questions, feel free to contact Customer Support at the number below.

 

Thank you as always,

 

Big Oil Support Teams

1(800)555-1221

 

 

 

 

 

*This is an automated message - replying to this message does not guarentee successful deliver.  Please use the above email address for reply's and support.

sys_variable_value.value: Your Authorization Request has been Rejected

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello 2➛Authorization Request Record➛Requesting User➛First name,

 

This message is to inform you of the rejection or cancellation for approval of 2➛Authorization Request Record➛Auth Name.  Your profile was not updated and no further changes should have been made regarding access to the Big Oil portal.  

If you believe this to be an error or have further questions, please contact our Customer Support team at the below phone number.

 

Thank you,

 

Big OIl Support Team

1(800)555-1221

 

 

*This is an automated message - replying to this message does not guarentee successful delivery.  Please use the above contact information to get a response.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Creates a task record with date due set to (trigger => )Created date + 5 days

Update (Trigger) Auth. Req. record Task Ref. field
Update task record to closed & add note

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^work_notes=Automatically closed upon Approval or Rejections of Task record.
approval is for authorized purchaser, update profile

sys_variable_value.value: Your Authorization Request has been Rejected

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello 2➛Authorization Request Record➛Requesting User➛First name,

 

This message is to inform you of the rejection or cancellation for approval of 2➛Authorization Request Record➛Auth Name.  Your profile was not updated and no further changes should have been made regarding access to the Big Oil portal.  

If you believe this to be an error or have further questions, please contact our Customer Support team at the below phone number.

 

Thank you,

 

Big OIl Support Team

1(800)555-1221

 

 

*This is an automated message - replying to this message does not guarentee successful delivery.  Please use the above contact information to get a response.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Auth. Req. record State field to Approval State value

sys_variable_value.value: Your Authorization Request has been Approved!

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello Trigger➛Authorization Request Record➛Requesting User➛First name,

 

This messagin has been sent to inform you the authorization request for Trigger➛Authorization Request Record➛Auth Name has been approved! Your profile has been updated to reflect this change and you should now have access to those features of the portal.  If you have any questions, feel free to contact Customer Support at the number below.

 

Thank you as always,

 

Big Oil Support Teams

1(800)555-1221

 

 

 

 

 

*This is an automated message - replying to this message does not guarentee successful deliver.  Please use the above email address for reply's and support.
